Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 101st overall pick, by Baltimore in 2013...
Traded from Baltimore to Houston on 3/2/2015 (Going to HOU: CF A. Cook. Going to BAL: P L. McCullers)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/16/2015, off Wade Davis (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/2015, off Dustin McGowan (LAN)...
Injured on 6/12/2016 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/25/2017...
Released by Houston on 10/2/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/7/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $1,551,551 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/11/2020, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 7/30/2020...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Toronto on 9/30/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 2/12/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/18/2023 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
